Is the Verus Coin Wiki a relatively new resource, created after February 12th, 2020?

No, the Verus Coin Wiki is not a new resource. If a document does not have a revision or creation date, it means that the document originates from before February 12th, 2020. This suggests that the wiki has been around for some time and has been collecting information since before that date.

# ![Verus Coin](https://wiki.verus.io/img/favicon.png "Verus Coin Wiki") Verus Coin Wiki
In this WIKI we collected the most frequently asked questions and useful guides that are related to Verus.On the bottom of each document, you may find a revision and/or creation date. If no date is mentioned the document originates from before february 12th, 2020 and may apply to older situations.If you have any questions about the information here, need help or have suggestions on the content, don't hesitate to contact us through [Discord](https://verus.io/discord).## Information
